name: 廖華彥
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Introduction and Strategies to Part 1
Week 3: Introduction and Strategies to Part 2
Week 4: Practice Test Parts 1 & 2
Week 5: Introduction and Strategies to Part 5
Week 6: Grammar and Vocabulary Introduction
Week 7: Introduction and Strategies to Part 6
Week 8: Practice Test Parts 5 & 6
Week 9: Introduction and Strategies to Part 3
Week 10: Introduction and Strategies to Part 4
Week 11: Practice Test Parts 3 & 4
Week 12: Introduction and Strategies to Part 7
Week 13: Practice Test Part 7
Week 14: Complete TOEIC test
Week 15: Discussion
Week 16: Complete TOEIC test
Week 17: Discussion
Week 18: No class
scorePolicy:
Practice quizzes: 40%
Complete practice test(s): 30%
Attendance: 30%
